 January 3rd, 2024

### Expected Contract End Date
 October 31st, 2029

### Notice Description
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for Interpretation Services, catering to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) and its clients. The contractor will provide consecutive and/or simultaneous oral interpretation services in multiple foreign languages to support case management, Parole Board hearings, and medical appointments.

### Objectives
The contractor must offer services in a wide range of languages, including consecutive and/or simultaneous oral interpretation. The contractor must be able to provide detailed and accurate interpretation services in a timely manner, ensuring confidentiality and respect for client communication.

### Deliverables
The contractor must deliver interpretation services in a variety of languages for meetings between CSC staff, Parole Board members, and clients. Interpretation services must be complete, accurate, and faithful to the original message.

### Tender Conditions
Prior to booking onsite services, the contractor and CSC will discuss alternatives such as teleconferencing. Any expenses incurred for travel must be approved in advance. The contractor must acknowledge receipt of service requests within 24 hours and provide quotes within 48 hours.
